definition[0]: able to be carried or moved easily
definition[1]: a portable computer program can be used on different computer systems
definition[2]: a piece of electronic equipment that can be easily carried or moved
example[1]: Get a portable, not a big TV.
definition[3]: portable software can be run on another computer system without changing it in any way
example[3]: The applications will be portable across different graphical user interfaces.
definition[4]: a computer that is light enough to be carried around
example[4]: He set his portable to automatically check his electronic mail boxes.
